name: f r o n t i e r _ d a z e
description:
🩸 goop loop #6 💧

celebrating 500k objkts on Hic et Nunc // Nov. 2nd, 2021

video loop with sound. footage found on used VHS tape purchased on eBay and manipulated in real-time with a Magnavox VHS player. video effects performed with Roland V4 video mixer and recorded with Roland P-10 video sampler. post-production performed in TouchDesigner and DaVinci Resolve. audio is original sound from VHS tape with leveling and crossfading performed in Ableton Live 11 Suite.
